PySD-Cookbook¶

A collection of simple recipes for advanced data analytics using PySD is available at: https://github.com/JamesPHoughton/PySD-Cookbook

The cookbook includes models, sample data, and code in the form of ipython notebooks that demonstrate a variety of data integration and analysis tasks, including:

  • Getting started with PySD and the Python data analytics stack
  • Basic PySD usage’
  • Optimizing models with run-at-a-time data fitting
  • Optimizing models with step-at-a-time data fitting
  • Fitting and exploring models across geographic scales
  • Surrogating SD model components with machine learning regression models

These models can be executed on your local machine, and modified to suit your particular analysis requirements.
